Description: Let The Undead Blanch With Fear!: Undead have Disadvantage on Attack Rolls against you, and you have Advantage on Saving Throws against their actions and spells.
LocationDescription: Can be bought or looted from Mystic Carrion in Philgrave's Mansion inside the Lower City.

Name: Vest of Soul Rejuvenation
Description:
Defier's Rejuvenation: Whenever the wearer succeeds on a Saving Throw against a Spell, they regain 1d4 Hit Points.
Greater Kushigo Counter: The wearer can use a reaction to make an unarmed strike against any attacker that misses.
LocationDescription: Obtained from Rolan or Lorroakan's Projection, depending on gameplay choices.

Name: Vicious Battleaxe
Description: Dolor Amarus: When you land a Critical Hit with this weapon, it deals an additional 7 damage.
LocationDescription: Sold by Echo of Abazigal in the Murder Tribunal after becoming an Unholy Assassin.

Name: Viconia's Priestess Robe
Description:
Shar's Umbrae: While obscured, the wearer has Advantage on Stealth Checks.
Sharran Veil: Shield of Faith also grants you a +2 to all Saving throws.
LocationDescription: Worn by Viconia DeVir, Mother Superior of the Shar Enclave under the House of Grief in the Lower City.

Name: Viconia's Walking Fortress
Description:
Rebuke of the Mighty: When a foe hits you with a melee attack, you can use your Reaction to deal them 2d8 Force damage and knock them Prone unless they succeed a Dexterity Saving Throw.
Spellguard: You gain Advantage on Saving Throws against spells. Spell Attack Rolls against you have Disadvantage.
LocationDescription: Dropped by Viconia DeVir during the quest Daughter of Darkness .

Name: Voss' Silver Sword
Description: Interplanar Slayer: This weapon grants a 1d4 bonus to Damage and Attack Rolls against githyanki, aberrations, fiends, and elementals.
GrantedSkills:
Lacerate
Rush Attack
Wrathful Smite (1st)
Pommel Strike
LocationDescription: Carried by Kith'rak Voss, can be killed in Act 1 or Act 2. Can be purchased when engaging in conversation with him in Act 3.

Name: Wavemother's Cloak
Description: Damp Aegis: During Combat, once per turn, the cloak grants the wearer Water Layer Protection until the wearer takes damage.
LocationDescription: Found in a chest in the Water Queen's House.

Name: Wavemother's Robe
Description:
Temperature Adjustment: You have resistance to Fire and Cold Damage.
Watery Rejuvenation: If the wearer is standing in a water surface at the start of their turn, they heal 1d4 hit points
LocationDescription: Complete the quest Avenge the Drowned given to you by Allandra Grey in the Water Queen's House during Act Three.

Name: Wavemother's Sickle
Description: Watery Guidance: This weapon has Advantage against Wet creatures.
LocationDescription: Dropped by Allandra Grey.

Name: Woe
Description:
Arcane Enchantment: You gain a +1 bonus to Spell Save DC and Spell Attack Rolls.
Arcane Vampirism: When the creatures affected by your spells fail any associated Saving Throws regain 1d4 Hit Points.
Bound Weapon
LocationDescription: Reward for defeating Cazador Szarr during The Pale Elf.
